title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Fixed two broken links in Copilot documentation by updating URLs from `docs.microsoft.com` to `learn.microsoft.com` and correcting the quickstart path.
Updated secret scanning configuration for Fastly provider to conditionally set `hasValidityCheck` based on GitHub version (`false` for fpt/ghes, `true` otherwise).
Synced secret scanning metadata hashes in `config.json` after configuration changes.
summary:

- Updated secret scanning configuration for Fastly provider to conditionally set `hasValidityCheck` based on GitHub version (`false` for fpt/ghes, `true` otherwise).
- Synced secret scanning metadata hashes in `config.json` after configuration changes.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Fixed two broken links in Copilot documentation by updating URLs from `docs.microsoft.com` to `learn.microsoft.com` and correcting the quickstart path.
- Updated secret scanning configuration for Fastly provider to conditionally set `hasValidityCheck` based on GitHub version (`false` for fpt/ghes, `true` otherwise).
- Synced secret scanning metadata hashes in `config.json` after configuration changes.
